item.title: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5
item.description: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5. Use I-5 South to Roseburg; I-5 north to Cottage Grove and Portland. This is the eastern end of OR-38. This segment of OR-99 ends here, and re-appears in Cottage Grove.

item.title: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at Curtin Road Jct.
item.description: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at Curtin Road Jct north to Anlauf and Lorane. Continue east on OR-38/OR-99 for Cottage Grove and I-5. The OR-38 shield is not displayed on this sign post, only OR-99.

item.title: OR-38 East at OR-99
item.description: OR-38 east at OR-99 (not signed) in Drain. Turn right for OR-99 south to Yoncalla and Roseburg. Continue straight on OR-38 East/OR-99 North to Eugene. This stretch of OR-99 south of Drain was formerly the Drain-Yoncalla Highway #236.

item.title: OR-38 East at OR-138
item.description: OR-38 east at OR-138. Turn right for OR-138 east to Roseburg and Sutherlin. Turn left for OR-38 east to Drain and Eugene.

item.title: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138
item.description: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138 in Elkton. Use OR-138 east for Sutherlin and Roseburg.

item.title: OR-38 East - Dean Creek
item.description: OR-38 east at Dean Creek bridge.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-38 East
item.description: US-101 north at OR-38 to Drain, and Eugene. OR-38 follows the Umpqua River east from Reedsport.

item.title: US-101 North approaching OR-38
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-38 to Umpqua Discovery Center and Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area.

item.title: US-101 North approaching OR-38
item.description: US-101 north approaching OR-38 to Drain and Eugene, next right.

item.title: US-101 North at OR-38 East
item.description: US-101 north at OR-38 to City Center, Drain, and Eugene.
